title.text: RFC 3679:  Unused Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) Option Codes

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                           R. Droms
Request for Comments: 3679                                 Cisco Systems
Category: Informational                                     January 2004
Unused Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) Option Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 未使用的动态主机配置协议（DHCP）选项代码

contents.text: Status of this Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录的状况

contents.text: This memo provides information for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard of any kind. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录为互联网社区提供信息。它没有规定任何类型的互联网标准。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Copyright Notice
contents.zh-CHS: 版权公告

contents.text: Copyright (C) The Internet Society (2004). All Rights Reserved.
contents.zh-CHS: 版权所有（C）互联网协会（2004年）。版权所有。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: Prior to the publication of RFC 2489 (which was updated by RFC 2939), several option codes were assigned to proposed Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) options that were subsequently never used. This document lists those unused option codes and directs IANA to make these option codes available for assignment to other DHCP options in the future.
contents.zh-CHS: 在发布RFC 2489（由RFC 2939更新）之前，为提议的动态主机配置协议（DHCP）选项分配了几个选项代码，这些选项后来从未使用过。本文档列出了这些未使用的选项代码，并指示IANA使这些选项代码可用于将来分配给其他DHCP选项。

contents.text: The document also lists several option codes that are not currently documented in an RFC but should not be made available for reassignment to future DHCP options.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件还列出了几个选项代码，这些代码目前未记录在RFC中，但不应提供给将来的DHCP选项重新分配。

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: Section 2 of this document lists the unused DHCP option codes from the IANA list of BOOTP and DHCP option codes [1]. Each option code includes any known documentation and contact information from the IANA list. IANA will make these option codes available for assignment to other DHCP options in the future.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件第2节列出了IANA BOOTP和DHCP选项代码列表中未使用的DHCP选项代码[1]。每个选项代码包括IANA列表中的任何已知文档和联系信息。IANA将在将来将这些选项代码分配给其他DHCP选项。

contents.text: Section 3 lists several DHCP option codes that are not currently documented in an RFC but should not be made available for reassignment to future DHCP options.
contents.zh-CHS: 第3节列出了几个DHCP选项代码，这些代码目前未记录在RFC中，但不应提供给将来的DHCP选项重新分配。

contents.text: 2. Unused DHCP Option Codes to be Reassigned to Future DHCP Options
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 要重新分配给未来DHCP选项的未使用DHCP选项代码

contents.text: The option codes listed in this section are to be returned to IANA for reassignment to new options. Responses from associated contact persons are noted where they have been received.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中列出的选项代码将返回给IANA，以便重新分配给新选项。相关联系人的回复记录在收到的地方。

contents.text: 2.1. Service Location Protocol Naming Authority
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1. 服务位置协议命名机构

contents.text: Code: 80 Name: Service Location Protocol Naming Authority Defined in: (expired Internet-Draft) Contact: Charlie Perkins Reason to recover: Never published as standard and not in general use
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：80名称：服务位置协议命名机构定义于：（过期的Internet草稿）联系人：Charlie Perkins恢复原因：从未作为标准发布，也未在一般使用中

contents.text: 2.2. Relay Agent Options
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2. 中继代理选项

contents.text: Codes: 83, 84 Name: Relay Agent Options Defined in: Early draft of RFC 3046 [2] Contact: (none) Reason to recover: Not defined in RFC 3046 as published
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：83，84名称：中定义的中继代理选项：RFC 3046早期草案[2]联系人：（无）恢复原因：未在发布的RFC 3046中定义

contents.text: 2.3. IEEE 1003.1 POSIX Timezone
contents.zh-CHS: 2.3. IEEE 1003.1 POSIX时区

contents.text: Code: 88 Name: IEEE 1003.1 POSIX Timezone Defined in: (expired Internet-Draft) Contact: Mike Carney Reason to recover: Never published as standard and not in general use
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：88名称：IEEE 1003.1 POSIX时区定义于：（过期的互联网草案）联系人：Mike Carney恢复原因：从未作为标准发布，也未普遍使用

contents.text: 2.4. FQDNs in DHCP Options
contents.zh-CHS: 2.4. DHCP选项中的FQDNs

contents.text: Code: 89 Name: FQDNs in DHCP Options Defined in: (expired Internet-Draft) Contact: Ralph Droms; agrees that option code should be reassigned Reason to recover: Never published as standard and not in general use
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：89名称：DHCP选项中的FQDNs定义于：（过期的Internet草稿）联系人：Ralph Droms；同意应重新分配选项代码恢复的原因：从未作为标准发布，也未在通用中发布

contents.text: 2.5. VINES TCP/IP Server
contents.zh-CHS: 2.5. VINES TCP/IP服务器

contents.text: Code: 91 Name: VINES TCP/IP Server Defined in: (none) Contact: (none) Reason to recover: Never published as Internet-Draft
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：91名称：VINES TCP/IP服务器在中定义：（无）联系人：（无）恢复原因：从未作为Internet草稿发布

contents.text: 2.6. Server Selection
contents.zh-CHS: 2.6. 服务器选择

contents.text: Code: 92 Name: Server Selection Defined in: (none) Contact: (none) Reason to recover: Never published as Internet-Draft
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：92名称：在中定义的服务器选择：（无）联系人：（无）恢复原因：从未作为Internet草稿发布

contents.text: 2.7 IPv6 Transition
contents.zh-CHS: 2.7 IPv6过渡

contents.text: Code: 96 Name: IPv6 Transition Defined in: (expired Internet-Draft) Contact: Dan Harrington; agrees that option code should be reassigned Reason to recover: Never published as standard and not in general use
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：96名称：IPv6过渡定义于：（过期的互联网草案）联系人：Dan Harrington；同意应重新分配选项代码恢复的原因：从未作为标准发布，也未在通用中发布

contents.text: 2.8. Printer Name
contents.zh-CHS: 2.8. 打印机名称

contents.text: Code: 100 Name: Printer Name Defined in: (none) Contact: (none) Reason to recover: Never published as Internet-Draft
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：100名称：在中定义的打印机名称：（无）联系人：（无）恢复原因：从未作为Internet草稿发布

contents.text: 2.9. Multicast Assignment through DHCP
contents.zh-CHS: 2.9. 通过DHCP的多播分配

contents.text: Code: 101 Name: Multicast Assignment through DHCP Defined in: (expired Internet-Draft) Contact: Baiju Patel, Munil Shah Reason to recover: Never published as standard and not in general use
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：101名称：通过DHCP的多播分配定义于：（过期的互联网草案）联系人：Baiju Patel，Munil Shah恢复原因：从未作为标准发布，也未在一般使用中

contents.text: 2.10. Swap Path
contents.zh-CHS: 2.10. 交换路径

contents.text: Code: 108 Name: Swap Path Defined in: (none) Contact: (none) Reason to recover: Never published as Internet-Draft
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：108名称：在中定义的交换路径：（无）联系人：（无）恢复原因：从未作为Internet草稿发布

contents.text: 2.11. IPX Compatibility
contents.zh-CHS: 2.11. IPX兼容性

contents.text: Code: 110 Name: IPX Compatibility Defined in: (none) Contact: Juan Luciani; agrees that option code should be reassigned Reason to recover: Never published as Internet-Draft
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：110名称：IPX兼容性定义于：（无）联系人：Juan Luciani；同意应重新分配选项代码恢复原因：从未作为互联网草稿发布

contents.text: 2.12. Failover
contents.zh-CHS: 2.12. 故障转移

contents.text: Code: 115 Name: Failover Defined in: Early revisions of "DHCP Failover Protocol" [3] Contact: Kim Kinnear Reason to recover: Current version of "DHCP Failover Protocol" does not use a DHCP option
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：115名称：中定义的故障转移：早期版本的“DHCP故障转移协议”[3]联系人：Kim Kinnear恢复原因：当前版本的“DHCP故障转移协议”未使用DHCP选项

contents.text: 3. Option codes to be reserved by IANA
contents.zh-CHS: 3. IANA保留的选项代码

contents.text: The option codes listed in this section are the subject of ongoing work in the DHC Working Group (WG). These option codes should remain on the IANA list of assigned option codes [1] until the DHC WG has made a final decision about their disposition.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中列出的选项代码是DHC工作组（WG）正在进行的工作的主题。这些选项代码应保留在IANA指定选项代码列表[1]中，直到DHC工作组就其处置做出最终决定。

contents.text: 3.1. Option codes used in PXE Specification
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1. PXE规范中使用的选项代码

contents.text: The following option codes are used in the "Preboot Execution Environment (PXE) Specification, Version 2.1" [4]. However, although these options are in widespread use by devices that use PXE, none of these option codes have been described in a published RFC.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下选项代码用于“预引导执行环境（PXE）规范，版本2.1”[4]。然而，尽管这些选项被使用PXE的设备广泛使用，但这些选项代码都没有在已发布的RFC中描述。

contents.text: The DHC WG will endeavor to have specifications for these options published.
contents.zh-CHS: DHC工作组将努力发布这些选项的规范。

contents.text: 3.1.1. Client System
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.1. 客户端系统

contents.text: Code: 93 Name: Client System Defined in: "Preboot Execution Environment (PXE) Specification, Version 2.1" [4] Contact: Michael Johnston (frenchy@quiet-like-a-panther.org)
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：93名称：在“预引导执行环境（PXE）规范，版本2.1”中定义的客户端系统[4]联系人：Michael Johnston(frenchy@quiet-like-a-panther.org）

contents.text: 3.1.2. Client NDI
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.2. 客户NDI

contents.text: Code: 94 Name: Client NDI Defined in: "Preboot Execution Environment (PXE) Specification, Version 2.1" [4] Contact: Michael Johnston (frenchy@quiet-like-a-panther.org)
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：94名称：在“预引导执行环境（PXE）规范，版本2.1”中定义的客户端NDI[4]联系人：Michael Johnston(frenchy@quiet-like-a-panther.org）

contents.text: 3.1.3. UUID/GUID Client Identifier
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.3. UUID/GUID客户端标识符

contents.text: Code: 97 Name: UUID/GUID Client Identifier Defined in: "Preboot Execution Environment (PXE) Specification, Version 2.1" [4] (and an expired Internet-Draft) Contact: Dan Harrington, Michael Johnston (frenchy@quiet-like-a-panther.org)
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：97名称：UUID/GUID客户端标识符定义于：“预引导执行环境（PXE）规范，版本2.1”[4]（和过期的Internet草稿）联系人：Dan Harrington，Michael Johnston(frenchy@quiet-like-a-panther.org）

contents.text: 3.2. In Use by Apple
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2. 苹果正在使用

contents.text: The following option codes are used by devices from Apple Computer. However, none of these option codes have been described in a published RFC.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下选项代码由Apple Computer的设备使用。但是，这些选项代码均未在已发布的RFC中描述。

contents.text: The DHC WG will endeavor to have specifications for these options published.
contents.zh-CHS: DHC工作组将努力发布这些选项的规范。

contents.text: 3.2.1. LDAP Servers
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2.1. LDAP服务器

contents.text: Code: 95 Name: LDAP Servers Defined in: (none) Contact: Dieter Siegmund, dieter@apple.com Reason to recover: Never published in an RFC
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：95名称：中定义的LDAP服务器：（无）联系人：Dieter Siegmund，dieter@apple.com恢复原因：从未在RFC中发布

contents.text: 3.2.2. Netinfo Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2.2. Netinfo参数

contents.text: Codes: 112, 113 Name: Netinfo Address, Netinfo Tag Defined in: (none) Contact: Dieter Siegmund, dieter@apple.com Reason to recover: Never published in an RFC
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：112113姓名：Netinfo地址，Netinfo标记定义于：（无）联系人：Dieter Siegmund，dieter@apple.com恢复原因：从未在RFC中发布
3.2.3. 统一资源定位地址

contents.text: Code: 114 Name: URL Defined in: (none) Contact: Dieter Siegmund, dieter@apple.com Reason to recover: Never published in an RFC
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：114姓名：URL在中定义：（无）联系人：Dieter Siegmund，dieter@apple.com恢复原因：从未在RFC中发布

contents.text: 3.3. Option Code Extensions
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3. 选项代码扩展

contents.text: Note that these option codes are identified in "Extending DHCP Options Codes" [5] as part of a mechanism for extending the set of option codes available to DHCP. If these option codes are not used for DHCP option code extension, they will be returned to IANA for reassignment to other DHCP options.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，这些选项代码在“扩展DHCP选项代码”[5]中标识，作为扩展DHCP可用选项代码集机制的一部分。如果这些选项代码未用于DHCP选项代码扩展，它们将返回给IANA，以便重新分配给其他DHCP选项。

contents.text: Codes: 126, 127 Name: Option Code Extensions Defined in: (expired Internet-Draft) Contact: Ralph Droms
contents.zh-CHS: 代码：126127名称：选项代码扩展定义于：（过期的互联网草稿）联系人：Ralph Droms

contents.text: 4. Already Returned for Reassignment
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 已返回重新分配

contents.text: The option codes 99, 102-107, 109 and 111 have already been returned for reassignment to future DHCP options.
contents.zh-CHS: 选项代码99、102-107、109和111已返回，以便重新分配给未来的DHCP选项。

contents.text: 5. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 安全考虑

contents.text: This document has no known security implications, as none of the reclaimed options are known to be in use.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档没有已知的安全含义，因为已知回收的选项中没有一个正在使用。

contents.text: 6. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 6. IANA考虑

contents.text: IANA has returned the DHCP option codes listed in Section 2 to the list of available option codes. These option codes may be reassigned to new DHCP options, according to the procedures in RFC 2939 [6]. IANA is requested to reassign these option codes after the list of option codes that have never been assigned or have previously been returned has been exhausted.
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已将第2节中列出的DHCP选项代码返回到可用选项代码列表中。根据RFC 2939[6]中的程序，这些选项代码可以重新分配给新的DHCP选项。在从未分配或之前已返回的选项代码列表用尽后，IANA被要求重新分配这些选项代码。

contents.text: Informative References
contents.zh-CHS: 资料性引用

contents.text: [1] Assigned Numbers Editor, IANA., "BOOTP and DHCP Parameters", http://www.iana.org/assignments/bootp-dhcp-parameters, February 2003.
contents.zh-CHS: [1] 分配号码编辑器，IANA.，“BOOTP和DHCP参数”，http://www.iana.org/assignments/bootp-dhcp-parameters，2003年2月。

contents.text: [2] Patrick, M., "DHCP Relay Agent Information Option", RFC 3046, January 2001.
contents.zh-CHS: [2] Patrick，M.，“DHCP中继代理信息选项”，RFC 3046，2001年1月。

contents.text: [3] Droms, R., Kinnear, K., Stapp, M., Volz, B., Gonczi, S., Rabil, G., Dooley, M. and A. Kapur, "DHCP Failover Protocol", Work in Progress.
contents.zh-CHS: [3] Droms，R.，Kinnear，K.，Stapp，M.，Volz，B.，Gonczi，S.，Rabil，G.，Dooley，M.和A.Kapur，“DHCP故障切换协议”，工作正在进行中。

contents.text: [4] Intel Corporation, "Preboot Execution Environment (PXE) Specification Version 2.1", http://www.pix.net/software/pxeboot/ archive/pxespec.pdf, September 1999.
contents.zh-CHS: [4] 英特尔公司，“预引导执行环境（PXE）规范版本2.1”，http://www.pix.net/software/pxeboot/ 存档/pxepc.pdf，1999年9月。

contents.text: [5] Volz, B., Droms, R. and T. Lemon, "Extending DHCP Options Codes", Work in Progress.
contents.zh-CHS: [5] Volz，B.，Droms，R.和T.Lemon，“扩展DHCP选项代码”，工作正在进行中。

contents.text: [6] Droms, R., "Procedures and IANA Guidelines for Definition of New DHCP Options and Message Types", BCP 43, RFC 2939, September 2000.
contents.zh-CHS: [6] Droms，R.，“新DHCP选项和消息类型定义的程序和IANA指南”，BCP 43，RFC 2939，2000年9月。
